title: SJB protestors throw coffin inside Presidential Secretariat
body_lines: The Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) protestors who have presently gathered outside the Presidential Secretariat have thrown a dummy coffin inside the Secretariat premises along with a flower wreath leading to a tense situation.
The STF has barricaded the premises as the protestors demand for President Gotabaya Rajapaksa to come out of the premises. (Yohan Perera)
